branding.title: Developed by Matt Interfaces – Your partner for custom e-commerce solutions

sw-settings-license-check.description: Professional CMS blocks for Shopware Shopping Experiences. Hero Slider, Two Columns layouts, scroll animations and more – built according to Shopware best practices.

features.heroSlider: Hero Slider – Multi-slide hero blocks with headlines, text, buttons, and images
features.heroSliderShort: Multi-slide hero with headlines, text, buttons, and images
features.heroTwoColumns: Hero Two Columns – Two-column layout with flexible background options and audio player
features.heroTwoColumnsShort: Two-column layout with background options and audio
features.heroVideoExtended: Hero Video Extended – Video hero blocks with headlines, text, and buttons (Coming soon)
features.heroVideoExtendedShort: Video hero with headlines, text, and buttons
features.heroInstagramFeed: Hero Instagram Feed – Instagram feed integration for mega menu and custom blocks (Coming soon)
features.heroInstagramFeedShort: Instagram feed for mega menu and widgets
features.megaMenu: Mega Menu Block – Advanced navigation block with products, widgets, and Instagram feed (Coming soon)
features.categorySlider: Category Slider – Category slider for product categories with images
features.faqBlock: FAQ Block – Accordion with Schema.org rich snippets for SEO
features.faqBlockShort: Accordion FAQ with SEO rich snippets
features.imageOverlay: Image Overlay – Full-width image with angled text overlay
features.bookingForm: Booking Form – Test ride requests and booking forms
features.timeline: Timeline – Year navigation with text and image slider
features.shoppingExperience: Advanced Product Detail – 360° gallery, variant configurator with prices, standard equipment
features.skeletonLoader: Skeleton Loader – Animated loading placeholders for optimal UX and perceived performance
features.skeletonLoaderShort: Animated loading placeholders for better UX

blockToggle.deactivatedMessage: {block} has been deactivated. Please save the settings.
blockToggle.hint: Click on an inactive card to activate. Hold active cards for 3 seconds to deactivate.
blockToggle.enabledMessage: {block} has been enabled. Please save the settings.
blockToggle.disabledMessage: {block} has been disabled. Please save the settings.
blockToggle.comingSoonMessage: {block} will be available in a future version.

animations.title: CSS Animation Classes for CMS Blocks
animations.description: Add these classes in CMS Admin under Block Settings → CSS Classes:

scrollSlide.name: scroll-slide-animation
scrollSlide.description: Slide-in animation (left/right) when scrolling into visible area

countUp.name: count-up-animation
countUp.description: Count-up animation (0 → target value) when scrolling into visible area

usage.title: Usage
usage.step3: CSS Classes field → Enter class (e.g. scroll-slide-animation)

shortcodeGenerator.title: Count-Up Shortcode Generator
shortcodeGenerator.targetHint: The number to count up to

copy.errorMessage: Could not copy the text. Please copy manually.

button.licenseExpiredMessage: Your license has expired. Please renew your license to continue using Hero Blocks.

success.title: License check successful
success.invalidMessage: License has expired. Please contact support.

error.checkMessage: The license check could not be performed. Please try again later.

warning.expiryMessage: Your license will expire in {days} days. Please renew your license to continue using Hero Blocks.

update.title: Plugin Updates
update.subtitle: Check for new versions and install updates
update.updateAvailableMessage: A new version ({latestVersion}) is available. Current version: {currentVersion}
update.noUpdateAvailable: You are already using the latest version
update.noUpdateAvailableMessage: You are already using the latest version ({currentVersion})
update.licenseExpiredMessage: Your license has expired. Updates can no longer be loaded. Please renew your license.
update.downloadSuccessMessage: The plugin update has been downloaded and installed successfully. Please refresh the page to see the changes.

instagram.licenseExpiredMessage: Your license has expired. Instagram Feed API requests are no longer possible. Please renew your license.
instagram.validationSuccessMessage: Your Instagram API credentials are valid and working correctly.
instagram.validationFailedMessage: The Instagram token validation could not be performed. Please check your API credentials.

setupGuide.title: Instagram Basic Display API - Setup Guide
setupGuide.description: Follow these steps to set up your Instagram app and obtain the required API credentials:

step1.title: Step 1: Create Instagram App
step1.description: Create a new app in the Facebook Developer Console. Select 'Instagram Basic Display' as the product type.

step2.title: Step 2: Configure App
step2.description: Configure your app: Add the Redirect URI, enable Instagram Basic Display API, and create test users (for development).

step3.title: Step 3: Generate Access Token
step3.description: Generate a Long-Lived Access Token via the Instagram Basic Display API. This token is valid for 60 days and can be automatically renewed with a Refresh Token.

instagramFeed.licenseExpiredMessage: Your license has expired. Instagram Feed API requests are no longer possible. Please renew your license.

bestPractices.title: Instagram Basic Display API - Best Practices
bestPractices.appId: Create an Instagram App in Facebook Developer Console (developers.facebook.com)
bestPractices.appSecret: Store App ID and App Secret securely (do not commit to Git)
bestPractices.redirectUri: Register the Redirect URI in Facebook Developer Console (must match exactly)
bestPractices.accessToken: Use Long-Lived Access Tokens (valid for 60 days) with automatic renewal via Refresh Token

languageSwitcher.hint: These languages will be displayed in the Language Switcher in the header (desktop).
languageSwitcher.noLanguages: No languages found. Please check your language configuration.

bookingForm.testEmailSuccessMessage: The test email was successfully sent to the mailcatcher.
bookingForm.testEmailFailedMessage: Could not send the test email. Please check your email configuration.
bookingForm.googleCalendarDesc: Google Calendar integration for automatic appointment synchronization
bookingForm.webhookDesc: Webhook for n8n and other automations
bookingForm.emailTemplateDesc: Customizable email templates for booking confirmations

renewal.title: Reactivate License & Level Up
renewal.message: Your license has expired – but no worries! With just one click, reactivate all premium features and take your store to the next level. Special benefits when renewing: Exclusive updates, priority support, and early access to new features. Invest in your success!

features.title: What you get when renewing:
features.support: Priority support with fast response time

modal.noSettingsAvailable: No settings available for this block.
